name: Color Sense (TeknoGameArmy)
description:
This game aims to hone the player's accuracy towards color. There will be several squares of one different color. Players are required to choose those different colors to earn points. Each point obtained will increase the player's score and will increase the difficulty level of the game. If the player chooses the wrong color, the game score will be reset to 0.

Game programming languages : HTML, Javascript and React Native

Game can also be played at: https://color-sense.kikiding.space/
